verses.verse: Now <WG1161> in <WG1722> the fifteenth <WG4003> year <WG2094> of the reign <WG2231> of Tiberius <WG5086> Caesar <WG2541>, Pontius <WG4194> Pilate <WG4091> being governor <WG2230> <WG5723> of Judaea <WG2449>, and <WG2532> Herod <WG2264> being tetrarch <WG5075> <WG5723> of the Galil <WG1056>, and <WG1161> his <WG846> brother <WG80> Philip <WG5376> tetrarch <WG5075> <WG5723> of Ituraea <WG2484> and <WG2532> of the region <WG5561> of Trachonitis <WG5139>, and <WG2532> Lysanias <WG3078> the tetrarch <WG5075> <WG5723> of Abilene <WG9>,

Annas <WG452> and <WG2532> Kayafa <WG2533> being <WG1909> the Kohen HaGodols <WG749>, the word <WG4487> of 'Elohim <WG2316> came <WG1096> <WG5633> unto <WG1909> Yochanan <WG2491> the son <WG5207> of Z'kharyah-yahu <WG2197> in <WG1722> the wilderness <WG2048>.

And <WG2532> he came <WG2064> <WG5627> into <WG1519> all <WG3956> the country about <WG4066> Yarden <WG2446>, preaching <WG2784> <WG5723> the immersion <WG908> of repentance <WG3341> for <WG1519> the remission <WG859> of sins <WG266>;

As <WG5613> it is written <WG1125> <WG5769> in <WG1722> the book <WG976> of the words <WG3056> of Esaias <WG2268> the prophet <WG4396>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, The voice <WG5456> of one crying <WG994> <WG5723> in <WG1722> the wilderness <WG2048>, Prepare ye <WG2090> <WG5657> the way <WG3598> of the YY <WG2962>, make <WG4160> <WG5720> his <WG846> paths <WG5147> straight <WG2117>.

Havahry <WG3956> valley <WG5327> shall be <WG2071> <WG5704> filled <WG4137> <WG5701>, and <WG2532> every <WG3956> mountain <WG3735> and <WG2532> hill <WG1015> shall be brought low <WG5013> <WG5701>; and <WG2532> the crooked <WG4646> shall be made <WG1519> straight <WG2117>, and <WG2532> the rough <WG5138> ways <WG3598> shall be made <WG1519> smooth <WG3006>;
And <WG2532> all <WG3956> flesh <WG4561> shall see <WG3700> <WG5695> the salvation <WG4992> of 'Elohim <WG2316>.

Then <WG3767> said <WG3004> <WG5707> he to the multitude <WG3793> that came forth <WG1607> <WG5740> to be immersed <WG907> <WG5683> of <WG5259> him <WG846>, O generation <WG1081> of vipers <WG2191>, who <WG5101> hath warned <WG5263> <WG5656> you <WG5213> to flee <WG5343> <WG5629> from <WG575> the wrath <WG3709> to come <WG3195> <WG5723>?

Bring forth <WG4160> <WG5657> therefore <WG3767> fruits <WG2590> worthy <WG514> of repentance <WG3341>, and <WG2532> begin <WG756> <WG5672> not <WG3361> to say <WG3004> <WG5721> within <WG1722> yourselves <WG1438>, We have <WG2192> <WG5719> Avraham <WG11> to our father <WG3962>: for <WG1063> I say <WG3004> <WG5719> unto you <WG5213>, That <WG3754> 'Elohim <WG2316> is able <WG1410> <WG5736> of <WG1537> these <WG5130> stones <WG3037> to raise up <WG1453> <WG5658> children <WG5043> unto Avraham <WG11>.

And <WG1161> now <WG2235> also <WG2532> the axe <WG513> is laid <WG2749> <WG5736> unto <WG4314> the root <WG4491> of the trees <WG1186>: every <WG3956> tree <WG1186> therefore <WG3767> which bringeth <WG4160> not <WG3361> forth <WG4160> <WG5723> good <WG2570> fruit <WG2590> is hewn down <WG1581> <WG5743>, and <WG2532> cast <WG906> <WG5743> into <WG1519> the fire <WG4442>.
And <WG2532> the people <WG3793> asked <WG1905> <WG5707> him <WG846>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, What <WG5101> shall we do <WG4160> <WG5692> then <WG3767>?

He answereth <WG611> <WG5679> and <WG1161> saith <WG3004> <WG5719> unto them <WG846>, He that hath <WG2192> <WG5723> two <WG1417> coats <WG5509>, let him impart <WG3330> <WG5628> to him that hath <WG2192> <WG5723> none <WG3361>; and <WG2532> he that hath <WG2192> <WG5723> meat <WG1033>, let him do <WG4160> <WG5720> likewise <WG3668>.

Then <WG1161> came <WG2064> <WG5627> also <WG2532> publicans <WG5057> to be immersed <WG907> <WG5683>, and <WG2532> said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto <WG4314> him <WG846>, Master <WG1320>, what <WG5101> shall we do <WG4160> <WG5692>?
And <WG1161> he said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto <WG4314> them <WG846>, Exact <WG4238> <WG5719> no <WG3367> more <WG4119> than <WG3844> that which is appointed <WG1299> <WG5772> you <WG5213>.

And <WG1161> the soldiers <WG4754> <WG5734> likewise <WG2532> demanded <WG1905> <WG5707> of him <WG846>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, And <WG2532> what <WG5101> shall we <WG2249> do <WG4160> <WG5692>? And <WG2532> he said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto <WG4314> them <WG846>, Do violence <WG1286> <WG5661> to no man <WG3367>, neither <WG3366> accuse any falsely <WG4811> <WG5661>; and <WG2532> be content <WG714> <WG5744> with your <WG5216> wages <WG3800>.

And <WG1161> as the people <WG2992> were in expectation <WG4328> <WG5723>, and <WG2532> all men <WG3956> mused <WG1260> <WG5740> in <WG1722> their <WG846> hearts <WG2588> of <WG4012> Yochanan <WG2491>, whether <WG3379> he <WG846> were <WG1498> <WG5751> the Moshiach <WG5547>, or not <WG3379>;

Yochanan <WG2491> answered <WG611> <WG5662>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723> unto them all <WG537>, I <WG1473> indeed <WG3303> immerse <WG907> <WG5719> you <WG5209> with water <WG5204>; but <WG1161> one mightier than <WG2478> I <WG3450> cometh <WG2064> <WG5736>, the latchet <WG2438> of whose <WG3739> <WG846> shoes <WG5266> I am <WG1510> <WG5748> not <WG3756> worthy <WG2425> to unloose <WG3089> <WG5658>: he <WG846> shall immerse <WG907> <WG5692> you <WG5209> with <WG1722> the Holy <WG40> Ghost <WG4151> and <WG2532> with fire <WG4442>:

Whose <WG3739> fan <WG4425> is in <WG1722> his <WG846> hand <WG5495>, and <WG2532> he will throughly purge <WG1245> <WG5692> his <WG846> floor <WG257>, and <WG2532> will gather <WG4863> <WG5692> the wheat <WG4621> into <WG1519> his <WG846> garner <WG596>; but <WG1161> the chaff <WG892> he will burn <WG2618> <WG5692> with fire <WG4442> unquenchable <WG762>.
And <WG2532> <WG3767> many <WG4183> other <WG2087> things <WG4183> <WG3303> in his exhortation <WG3870> <WG5723> preached <WG2097> <WG5710> he unto the people <WG2992>.

But <WG1161> Herod <WG2264> the tetrarch <WG5076>, being reproved <WG1651> <WG5746> by <WG5259> him <WG846> for <WG4012> Herodias <WG2266> his <WG846> brother <WG80> Philip's <WG5376> wife <WG1135>, and <WG2532> for <WG4012> all <WG3956> the evils <WG4190> which <WG3739> Herod <WG2264> had done <WG4160> <WG5656>,
Added <WG4369> <WG5656> yet <WG2532> this <WG5124> above <WG1909> all <WG3956>, that <WG2532> he shut up <WG2623> <WG5656> Yochanan <WG2491> in <WG1722> prison <WG5438>.

Now <WG1161> when all <WG537> the people <WG2992> were immersed <WG1722> <WG907> <WG5683>, it came to pass <WG1096> <WG5633>, that Yeshuw`a <WG2424> also <WG2532> being immersed <WG907> <WG5685>, and <WG2532> davvening <WG4336> <WG5740>, the heaven <WG3772> was opened <WG455> <WG5683>,

And <WG2532> the Holy <WG40> Ghost <WG4151> descended <WG2597> <WG5629> in a bodily <WG4984> shape <WG1491> like <WG5616> a dove <WG4058> upon <WG1909> him <WG846>, and <WG2532> a voice <WG5456> came <WG1096> <WG5635> from <WG1537> heaven <WG3772>, which said <WG3004> <WG5723>, Thou <WG4771> art <WG1488> <WG5748> my <WG3450> beloved <WG27> Son <WG5207>; in <WG1722> thee <WG4671> I am well pleased <WG2106> <WG5656>.

And <WG2532> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> himself <WG846> began <WG756> <WG5734> to be <WG2258> <WG5713> about <WG5616> thirty <WG5144> years of age <WG2094>, being <WG5607> <WG5752> (as <WG5613> was supposed <WG3543> <WG5712>) the son <WG5207> of Yosef <WG2501>, which was the son of Heli <WG2242>,
Which was the son of Matthat <WG3158>, which was the son of Levi <WG3017>, which was the son of Melchi <WG3197>, which was the son of Janna <WG2388>, which was the son of Yosef <WG2501>,
Which was the son of Mattathias <WG3161>, which was the son of Amos <WG301>, which was the son of Naum <WG3486>, which was the son of Esli <WG2069>, which was the son of Nagge <WG3477>,
Which was the son of Maath <WG3092>, which was the son of Mattathias <WG3161>, which was the son of Semei <WG4584>, which was the son of Yosef <WG2501>, which was the son of Juda <WG2455>,
Which was the son of Yochanah <WG2490>, which was the son of Rhesa <WG4488>, which was the son of Zorobabel <WG2216>, which was the son of Salathiel <WG4528>, which was the son of Neri <WG3518>,
Which was the son of Melchi <WG3197>, which was the son of Addi <WG78>, which was the son of Cosam <WG2973>, which was the son of Elmodam <WG1678>, which was the son of Er <WG2262>,
Which was the son of Jose <WG2499>, which was the son of Eliezer <WG1663>, which was the son of Jorim <WG2497>, which was the son of Matthat <WG3158>, which was the son of Levi <WG3017>,
Which was the son of SHim`on <WG4826>, which was the son of Juda <WG2455>, which was the son of Yosef <WG2501>, which was the son of Jonan <WG2494>, which was the son of Eliakim <WG1662>,
Which was the son of Melea <WG3190>, which was the son of Menan <WG3104>, which was the son of Mattatha <WG3160>, which was the son of Natan <WG3481>, which was the son of David <WG1138>,
Which was the son of Yishai <WG2421>, which was the son of `Oved <WG5601>, which was the son of Booz <WG1003>, which was the son of Salmon <WG4533>, which was the son of Naasson <WG3476>,
Which was the son of Aminadab <WG284>, which was the son of Aram <WG689>, which was the son of Esrom <WG2074>, which was the son of Phares <WG5329>, which was the son of Juda <WG2455>,
Which was the son of Ya`akov <WG2384>, which was the son of Yitz'chak <WG2464>, which was the son of Avraham <WG11>, which was the son of Thara <WG2291>, which was the son of Nachor <WG3493>,
Which was the son of Saruch <WG4562>, which was the son of Ragau <WG4466>, which was the son of Phalec <WG5317>, which was the son of Heber <WG1443>, which was the son of Sala <WG4527>,
Which was the son of Kayinan <WG2536>, which was the son of Arphaxad <WG742>, which was the son of Sem <WG4590>, which was the son of Noe <WG3575>, which was the son of Lamech <WG2984>,
Which was the son of Mathusala <WG3103>, which was the son of Hanokh <WG1802>, which was the son of Yered <WG2391>, which was the son of Maleleel <WG3121>, which was the son of Kayinan <WG2536>,
Which was the son of Enos <WG1800>, which was the son of SHet <WG4589>, which was the son of Adam <WG76>, which was the son of 'Elohim <WG2316>.
